languages.text: {n}Сервочерепа подлетают поближе, чтобы не пропустить ни единого слова. Золотое перо, закрепленное в глотке сервочерепа на месте языка, старательно выводит слова на свитке.{/n}
{n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервочерепа подлетают поближе, чтобы не пропустить ни единого слова. Золотое перо, закрепленное в глотке сервочерепа на месте языка, старательно выводит слова на свитке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill in place of a servo-skull's tongue begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴォスカルたちは、一語たりとも逃さないように、あなたの近くに浮かんでいる。スカルの舌のあるべき場所に金色の羽ペンが現れ、あなたの物語を丹念に巻物に記し始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴォスカルたちは、一語たりとも逃さないように、あなたの近くに浮かんでいる。スカルの舌のあるべき場所に金色の羽ペンが現れ、あなたの物語を丹念に巻物に記し始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Servoschädel nähern sich, um kein einziges Wort zu verpassen. An der Stelle, wo bei einem der Schädel die Zunge wäre, erscheint eine goldene Schreibfeder und beginnt feinsäuberlich, deine Geschichte auf einer Schriftrolle niederzuschreiben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Servoschädel nähern sich, um kein einziges Wort zu verpassen. An der Stelle, wo bei einem der Schädel die Zunge wäre, erscheint eine goldene Schreibfeder und beginnt feinsäuberlich, deine Geschichte auf einer Schriftrolle niederzuschreiben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les servocrânes se rapprochent pour capter le moindre mot. Une plume dorée apparaît dans la bouche d'un des crânes et entreprend de consigner minutieusement chaque détail de votre récit sur un parchemin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les servocrânes se rapprochent pour capter le moindre mot. Une plume dorée apparaît dans la bouche d'un des crânes et entreprend de consigner minutieusement chaque détail de votre récit sur un parchemin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los servocráneos flotan junto a ti para no perderse una sola palabra. Una pluma dorada asoma por donde uno de los cráneos debería tener la lengua y comienza a transcribir concienzudamente el relato de tu vida en un pergamino.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los servocráneos flotan junto a ti para no perderse una sola palabra. Una pluma dorada asoma por donde uno de los cráneos debería tener la lengua y comienza a transcribir concienzudamente el relato de tu vida en un pergamino.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伺服头骨阵列朝你靠得更近了些，不漏掉你说出的任何一个字。其中一颗头骨舌头的位置出现了一支金色的羽毛笔，在羊皮纸上认认真真地记起了你口述的故事。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服头骨阵列朝你靠得更近了些，不漏掉你说出的任何一个字。其中一颗头骨舌头的位置出现了一支金色的羽毛笔，在羊皮纸上认认真真地记起了你口述的故事。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmeletler, tek bir kelimeyi dahi kaçırmamak için sana iyice sokuluyor. Kafataslarından birinin dilinin olması gereken yerde altından bir kalem beliriyor ve söylediklerini tomara geçirmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls hover closer so as not to miss a single word. A golden quill appears where one skull's tongue should be and begins painstakingly committing your tale to a scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmeletler tek kelimeni bile kaçırmamak için sana iyice sokuluyorlar. Kafataslarından birinin dilinin olması gereken yerde altından bir kalem beliriyor ve söylediklerini tomara geçirmeye başlıyor.{/n}
